item.description:
Join P-Collective Member Chica at March Ma[d]squerade Party at Firehouse 13!!!

There will be bands! Mighty Tiny (from Boston), Hemlok (from Providence), and Y Band of Robots (also from Providence)

There will be food! Mijos tacos truck. Parked in front of Firehouse 13 from 8pm-1am tantalizing taste buds with his DELICIOUS delicacies from south of the border and east of the Atlantic.

There will be booze! A nice selection of beers and wines available for purchase throughout the night at the venue.

There will be dancing! Belly dancing to be precise. Hemlok has decided to bring their awesome belly dancer to show us all how it's done.

There will be masks! Given that this event will consist of vaudevillian and steampunkish elements, it is suggested that you incorporate either of these elements into your attire for the evening. We will try to have some masquerade masks for sale.

There will be people! Feel free to bring as many friends you want as this will be a night not to forget.

$10 at door or online for $7 at http://fh13.frontgatetickets.com/choose.php?a=1&lid=64965&eid=73684

For more information: http://fh13.com/event/march-madsquerade/

PLEASE RSVP so Chica knows who to look for and get your tickets at the door or prior to the event!
item.how_to_find_us: Chica is hosting this one, please look at her picture!!!!
item.name: March Ma[d]squerade Party at Firehouse 13!!!
